title: Limit the size of 'storage' folder in profile folder
content:
How can I limit the size of 'storage' folder in profile folder? IS there a setting for this?

I understand that this folder is used by websites to store information on your disk, such as site preferences etc. Is that correct?

Thanks.
creator: d.e.a.newton

title: N ew version of FireFox will not connect when using a VPN.
content:
New version of Firefox will not connect when using a VPN. I have 1 other workspace with the newest version of FF but it will not connect if i use a VPN, i have tried 2 with the same result. I think it is the new version giving the problem so how could i reset FF to a earlier version like 93, 

i`m using it now with no problems so far.
creator: ip131

title: Firefox.exe impossibile trovare punto di ingresso (api-ms-win-crt-private-l1-1-0.dll)
content:
Salve,

dall'ultimo aggiornamento di ieri Firefox mostra il messaggio d'errore segnalato nel topic.

Per poter proseguire occorre dare cancel almeno 5-6 volte e dopo funziona tutto.

Il problema appare solamente alla prima apertura di Firefox.

Ho provato di tutto :

- aggiornamento runtime (e tutto il pacchetto visual) - pulizia e varie procedure di ripristino compreso controllo .dll sfc /scannow - seguito almeno una decina di guide relative al problema sul punto di ingresso

Non posso ripristinare il sistema a 6 gg fa perche' mi dice che c'e' un file in uso (pare che questo errore sia tipico a chi abbia Windows 7)

Comunque, la cosa è seccante perche' fino a ieri andava tutto bene e mi spiace dover abbandonare Firefox per questo problema.

Anticipatamente grazie.

ps : ho provato anche con il pacchetto WindowsUCRT che dovrebbe ripristinare le dll crt ma avendo Win 7 credo che sia inutile e difatti non ha risolto il problema.

Luca
creator: formatoetichette

title: Stripe.com crashing Firefox
content:
Hi guys! Stripe.com crashes FF. The site only displays about halfway down its homepage, then crashes FF. I've cleared cookies, all history, removed and reloaded FF, turned off tracking protection for Stripe at the address bar, lowered tracking settings to standard in FF, turned off hardware acceleration, and contacted Stripe directly. But they can't help with browser specific issues accept to offer standard solutions, which I already tried. Also, Stripe works fine in Chrome.

I'm using 1password extension, and for plugins: OpenH264 Video Codec provided by Cisco Systems, Inc. and Widevine Content Decryption Module provided by Google Inc. I deactivated both those plugins but no use. Ideas? Thanks! Ken
creator: kenjensen990

title: My apps on Firefox disappeared. I had plenty of these. How can I get them back?

title: uninstall latest Firefox ESR update
content: I used to have Firefox ESR 78.15.0 - I now have ESR 91.3.0 and do not like it. One of my most useful tools has been removed (you could right click in a page and you got a box that would allow you to view the page's properties. The one on the new version takes you to a different page with a lot of computer language). I want to know how to go back to the previous version of windows as this feature helped me a lot with my work.

title: Facebook pictures quit appearing after long session
content:
Facebook pictures quit appearing after long session. What appears is a "box" with brief descriptive text.

This began about a month ago.

Works fine for about an hour or more.

Clearing cache does not help.

Going slower or waiting does not help.

Happens at all hours, same way, at busy or low use times.

Different DNS at the two locations.

If I totally shut down the system and reboot, that usually fixes it for a while. Shut down Firefox and restart does not help.

This occurs on two different, but similar machines at two different locations, with different fiber-fed ISPs.

Firefox 94.0, 64bit, Ubuntu 18.04
creator: RogerDavis
